alert.note: Alert for Gila (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 20 at 6:43AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flow in Tonto Creek has increased above Action Stage making unbridged crossings unsafe to cross. * WHERE...A portion of east central Arizona, including the following county, Gila. * WHEN...Until 945 AM MST. * IMPACTS...Unbridged crossings in Punkin Center and Tonto Basin are not passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 643 AM MST, Upstream gauge reports indicated flooding is ongoing. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tonto Basin and Punkin Center. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
